data.expected_result: It isn't supposed to be clickable there where it actually isn't
data.short_description: When in a VC, the voice channel/server name can be clicked from further away then it actually is
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server with a short name - Have a VC with a short name - Join that VC - Observe the text under the "Voice Connected" - Try clicking it more on the right - Observe
